'''...I'm Sorry, Sir, But You're Ineligible''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to defeat the Everlasting Lord of Arcane Wisdom during the quest ''[[Where the Boat of Consciousness Lies]]''.
